channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration releases trove of files on Martin Luther King Jr. assassination
item.description: The release came in response to an executive order issued by President Trump. King's family warned they would object to any use of the records "to spr...

item.title: 7/14: Face the Nation
item.description: This week on "Face the Nation," a gunman opened fire at former President Donald Trump's rally on Saturday, sending a bullet grazing the former preside...

item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, "The Cosby Show" star, dies at 54
item.description: Actor and director Malcolm-Jamal Warner, best known for his role on "The Cosby Show," has died.

item.title: 7/21: The Daily Report
item.description: Jericka Duncan reports on the sentencing of Brett Hankinson in the case of Breonna Taylor, new polling that takes the pulse of how Americans feel abou...

item.title: 'My friend died right in front of me' - Student describes moment air force jet crashed into school
item.description: Farhan Hasan had just sat an exam when a Bangladeshi air force jet crashed into his school, killing at least 20 people.

item.title: 7/21: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Some Republicans push for the release of the Epstein files; Axios: White House officials express concern over Netanyahu

item.title: Things to know about the release of federal documents related to MLK’s assassination
item.description: Federal records related to the investigation into the assassination of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. have been released.

item.title: Accuser says 'rollercoaster' of Epstein files saga is a 'real weight' on victims
item.description: Annie Farmer believes the case has been politicised and says the recent wave of publicity has left her feeling "used" and exhausted.

item.title: Taylor Swift and Drake music giant files to list on US stock market
item.description: It comes as two major US share indexes closed at new record highs on Monday.

item.title: 7/21: CBS Evening News
item.description: Pilot makes "aggressive maneuver" to avoid B-52 bomber; Which presidents drew these doodles?

item.title: The voices in the cockpit fuelling controversy over Air India crash
item.description: Air India 171's crash report offered no closure - just more speculation and one haunting, unexplained detail.

item.title: Migrants deported from US tortured in El Salvador, Venezuela says
item.description: Venezuela is investigating claims of human rights abuses against 250 people detained in notorious prison.

item.title: Trump said he'd 'try to save' Afghan refugees in the UAE. That could be complicated

item.title: Military bases in New Jersey, Indiana, to be expanded to detain immigrants
item.description: NPR has learned that the Pentagon has also approved the expansion of the U.S. Naval Base on Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for the same purpose.

item.title: Trump's spy chief claims the Obama administration 'manufactured' intel on Russia
